additional_info:
Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Generator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Two minutes walk from the beautiful park of Vake and from the main Chavchavadze avenue.The apartment has one bedroom, a living room, balcony, kitchen/dining room, bathroom/toilet. The apartment is fully equipped by central heating, air condition, free WiFi and TV cable. Bed linens, toiletries, hear dryer, towels, washing machine, microwave are provided. Our street and our parallel street are full of various cafes and restaurants with Georgian, Asian and European cuisine, lots of different shops and supermarkets
